job_tasks.phrase: Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions expertise in 'Gen AI algorithms' and using 'AI/ML techniques to solve business problems', which aligns with the definition of developing and fine-tuning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business problems and designing AI solutions to address them, fitting the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific visualization tools like Power BI/Tableau falls under the broader category of Traditional Data Tools for analysis and validation.

job_tasks.phrase: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment is a core MLOps task, aligning with the definition of Operations & MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of products and services, which is a core software engineering task, even if it's AI-focused.

job_tasks.phrase: showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the approach to problem-solving and testing, fitting the 'Problem Solving & Pragmatism' category.
Directly mentions 'excellent communication skills', fitting the 'Communication & Collaboration' category.
Being 'comfortable with uncertainty' indicates adaptability and a willingness to navigate evolving situations, aligning with 'Learning & Adaptability'.

profile.rationale: The role requires a strong foundation in AI/ML techniques and GenAI algorithms (1.B.1), alongside the design and implementation of GenAI use cases for business problems (1.C.1). It also includes core software engineering tasks like building CI/CD pipelines (1.A.2) and developing products/services (1.A.1). The emphasis on GenAI algorithms and use cases, combined with software engineering practices, points to a balanced role focused on Generative AI, thus fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to GenAI, business problem-solving, and MLOps. While it mentions traditional data tools, the core focus is on GenAI. The profile assignment is straightforward based on the explicit mentions of GenAI algorithms and use cases alongside software engineering practices. A slightly lower score is given because the ad doesn't explicitly mention LLM frameworks or prompt engineering, but the overall description strongly suggests a GenAI focus.
